0x00400000  0x0c100004  jal 0x00400010        14       jal soma_vetores
0x00400004  0x0c100018  jal 0x00400060        15       jal subtrai_vetores
0x00400008  0x0c10002c  jal 0x004000b0        18       jal produto_escalar_CD
0x0040000c  0x08100041  j 0x00400104          21       j end
0x00400010  0x3c011001  lui $1,4097           25       la $t0, A     # Endereço de A
0x00400014  0x34280008  ori $8,$1,8                
0x00400018  0x3c011001  lui $1,4097           26       la $t1, B     # Endereço de B
0x0040001c  0x34290028  ori $9,$1,40               
0x00400020  0x3c011001  lui $1,4097           27       la $t2, C     # Endereço de C
0x00400024  0x342a0048  ori $10,$1,72              
0x00400028  0x3c011001  lui $1,4097           28       lw $t3, n     # Carrega n
0x0040002c  0x8c2b0004  lw $11,4($1)               
0x00400030  0x240c0000  addiu $12,$0,0        30       li $t4, 0     # $t4 = i = 0
0x00400034  0x8d0d0000  lw $13,0($8)          33       lw $t5, 0($t0)     # Carrega A[i]
0x00400038  0x8d2e0000  lw $14,0($9)          34       lw $t6, 0($t1)     # Carrega B[i]
0x0040003c  0x01ae7820  add $15,$13,$14       35       add $t7, $t5, $t6  # Calcula A[i] + B[i]
0x00400040  0xad4f0000  sw $15,0($10)         36       sw $t7, 0($t2)     # Armazena em C[i]
0x00400044  0x21080004  addi $8,$8,4          38       addi $t0, $t0, 4   # Próximo elemento de A
0x00400048  0x21290004  addi $9,$9,4          39       addi $t1, $t1, 4   # Próximo elemento de B
0x0040004c  0x214a0004  addi $10,$10,4        40       addi $t2, $t2, 4   # Próximo elemento de C
0x00400050  0x218c0001  addi $12,$12,1        42       addi $t4, $t4, 1   # Incrementa i
0x00400054  0x018b082a  slt $1,$12,$11        43       blt $t4, $t3, loop_soma  # Loop se i < n
0x00400058  0x1420fff6  bne $1,$0,-10              
0x0040005c  0x03e00008  jr $31                45       jr $ra            # Retorna
0x00400060  0x3c011001  lui $1,4097           49       la $t0, A     # Endereço de A
0x00400064  0x34280008  ori $8,$1,8                
0x00400068  0x3c011001  lui $1,4097           50       la $t1, B     # Endereço de B
0x0040006c  0x34290028  ori $9,$1,40               
0x00400070  0x3c011001  lui $1,4097           51       la $t2, D     # Endereço de D
0x00400074  0x342a0068  ori $10,$1,104             
0x00400078  0x3c011001  lui $1,4097           52       lw $t3, n     # Carrega n
0x0040007c  0x8c2b0004  lw $11,4($1)               
0x00400080  0x240c0000  addiu $12,$0,0        54       li $t4, 0     # $t4 = i = 0
0x00400084  0x8d0d0000  lw $13,0($8)          57       lw $t5, 0($t0)     # Carrega A[i]
0x00400088  0x8d2e0000  lw $14,0($9)          58       lw $t6, 0($t1)     # Carrega B[i]
0x0040008c  0x01ae7822  sub $15,$13,$14       59       sub $t7, $t5, $t6  # Calcula A[i] - B[i]
0x00400090  0xad4f0000  sw $15,0($10)         60       sw $t7, 0($t2)     # Armazena em D[i]
0x00400094  0x21080004  addi $8,$8,4          62       addi $t0, $t0, 4   # Próximo elemento de A
0x00400098  0x21290004  addi $9,$9,4          63       addi $t1, $t1, 4   # Próximo elemento de B
0x0040009c  0x214a0004  addi $10,$10,4        64       addi $t2, $t2, 4   # Próximo elemento de D
0x004000a0  0x218c0001  addi $12,$12,1        66       addi $t4, $t4, 1   # Incrementa i
0x004000a4  0x018b082a  slt $1,$12,$11        67       blt $t4, $t3, loop_subtrai  # Loop se i < n
0x004000a8  0x1420fff6  bne $1,$0,-10              
0x004000ac  0x03e00008  jr $31                69       jr $ra            # Retorna
0x004000b0  0x3c011001  lui $1,4097           73       la $t0, C     # Endereço de C
0x004000b4  0x34280048  ori $8,$1,72               
0x004000b8  0x3c011001  lui $1,4097           74       la $t1, D     # Endereço de D
0x004000bc  0x34290068  ori $9,$1,104              
0x004000c0  0x3c011001  lui $1,4097           75       lw $t2, n     # Carrega n
0x004000c4  0x8c2a0004  lw $10,4($1)               
0x004000c8  0x240b0000  addiu $11,$0,0        76       li $t3, 0     # PE = 0 (inicializa o produto escalar)
0x004000cc  0x240c0000  addiu $12,$0,0        78       li $t4, 0     # $t4 = i = 0
0x004000d0  0x8d0d0000  lw $13,0($8)          81       lw $t5, 0($t0)     # Carrega C[i]
0x004000d4  0x8d2e0000  lw $14,0($9)          82       lw $t6, 0($t1)     # Carrega D[i]
0x004000d8  0x71ae7802  mul $15,$13,$14       83       mul $t7, $t5, $t6  # Calcula C[i] * D[i]
0x004000dc  0x016f5820  add $11,$11,$15       84       add $t3, $t3, $t7  # Acumula em PE
0x004000e0  0x21080004  addi $8,$8,4          86       addi $t0, $t0, 4   # Próximo elemento de C
0x004000e4  0x21290004  addi $9,$9,4          87       addi $t1, $t1, 4   # Próximo elemento de D
0x004000e8  0x218c0001  addi $12,$12,1        89       addi $t4, $t4, 1   # Incrementa i
0x004000ec  0x018a082a  slt $1,$12,$10        90       blt $t4, $t2, loop_produto_escalar  # Loop se i < n
0x004000f0  0x1420fff7  bne $1,$0,-9               
0x004000f4  0x3c011001  lui $1,4097           93       la $t8, PE         # Endereço de PE
0x004000f8  0x34380000  ori $24,$1,0               
0x004000fc  0xaf0b0000  sw $11,0($24)         94       sw $t3, 0($t8)     # Salva o resultado do produto escalar em PE
0x00400100  0x03e00008  jr $31                96       jr $ra         # Retorna
